page.title: 10A MATHON DAY
page.content: In the morning I get up at about 6.45 to 7.30.I then do my piano and recorder practise.After that I have breakfast and go to school in Colwall.First of all I have assembly followed by chapel,then lessons until 10.20 when we have break.After break we have lessons till 12.50 then we have lunch.After lunch I have either choir practise or reading prep. Following this are lessons till 3.35 and then prep till 4.15.Then we have 15 minutes to get changed for games.After games,at 6.00 I go home. At home I wait for tea either going outside or watching television.After tea I either go outside or watch television again.I then go to bed. In bed I either do homework or read, then I go to sleep.
